CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many stages are there in this funnel chart?

SRP.Q: Is the Post-Distribution stage positioned above or below the Delivered to End Users stage?
SRP.A: The Post-Distribution stage is positioned {above} the Delivered to End Users stage.

VPR.Q: What pattern does the data reduction follow in this funnel chart?
VPR.A: The data reduction follows a {linear} pattern.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Delivered to End Users?
VE.A: The value of stage Delivered to End Users is {29833}.

VE.Q: What is the value of stage Post-Transmission?
VE.A: The value of stage Post-Transmission is {53961}.

EVJ.Q: What is the maximum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the highest value is Total Energy Generated, with a value of {77360}.

EVJ.Q: What is the minimum value in the funnel chart?
EVJ.A: The stage with the lowest value is Billed Consumption, with a value of {19539}.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Total Energy Generated to stage Post-Generation?
SC.A: Decreased by {10963} Megawatt Hours from stage Total Energy Generated to stage Post-Generation.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Post-Generation to stage Post-Transmission?
SC.A: Decreased by {12436} Megawatt Hours from stage Post-Generation to stage Post-Transmission.

SC.Q: How much did it decrease from stage Post-Transmission to stage Post-Distribution?
SC.A: Decreased by {12050} Megawatt Hours from stage Post-Transmission to stage Post-Distribution.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value exceed 60179? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Total Energy Generated} stage has {77360}, the {Post-Generation} stage has {66397}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall below 35872? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.
NF.A: The {Delivered to End Users} stage has {29833}, the {Billed Consumption} stage has {19539}.

NF.Q: In which stages of the funnel chart does the value fall between 35872 and 47936? Please list the stage labels and corresponding values.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Post-Distribution to Delivered to End Users, or from stage Post-Generation to Post-Transmission?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Generation} to {Post-Transmission} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is greater: from stage Post-Distribution to Delivered to End Users, or from stage Delivered to End Users to Billed Consumption?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Distribution} to {Delivered to End Users} is greater.

NC.Q: Which reduction is the greatest: from stage Post-Transmission to Post-Distribution, from stage Post-Generation to Post-Transmission, or from stage Total Energy Generated to Post-Generation?
NC.A: The reduction from stage {Post-Generation} to stage {Post-Transmission} is the greatest.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the largest?
MSR.A: The largest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Post-Generation} and {Post-Transmission} stages.

MSR.Q: Between which two consecutive stages in the funnel chart is the conversion rate drop the smallest?
MSR.A: The smallest drop in conversion rate occurs between the {Delivered to End Users} and {Billed Consumption} stages.
